com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.JsonSerializable
      • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Resource
        • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.Permission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Permission
extends Resource
    Represents a per-User Permission to access a specific resource e.g. Document or Collection in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
